defs: to compress or push down at the centre of something.
the middle of the day; noon.
a small cup kept by the side of a dining plate, for holding sauce, curry or any of other dishes.
midway - a) the middle of the way or distance b) a middle way or course.
to set, position in a certain place.
to lie in between or near.
to get some space, room or shelter.
to have a favourable occasion or opportunity.
to have; to get; to possess.
a house in between two houses.
the room or hall situated at the centre of a house.
(an opportunity, occasion) to happen; to be got; to befall.
an occurence of forgetfulness, obliviousness while an action or process is in progress.
to be obstructedm or interrupted; (the flow) to be cut off.
to go in between; to interrupt.
to cause to come in between; to make (someone) interfere.
a stopping or abandoning of the process, action in between (before achieving the goal); an interruption; a premature cessation.
the colour made by blending black and white colours; grey colour.
an unexpected or unusual condition of drought and shortage or non-availability of essential items.
= ಎಡೆವರಿ.
(the place) to become dry; (water, moisture content) to be evaporated.
a speech or casual remark interrupting conversation, discussion between or among others.
to go or come in between or across.
= ಎಡೆವಿಡಿವು.
to get hold of a shelter.
to get an opportunity.
the fact or an instance of having an interval of time or intermediary space, room, etc.
to cause to have an intermediary space or time.
to leave room in between.
to give an interval of time.
to stop (a process, chain of events) for a brief period; to interrupt the flow.
= ಎಡೆವೊಗು.
= ಎಡೆಯುಡುಗು.
the finger between the ring-finger and the index finger; the middle finger of the hand.
to get some space, room or shelter.
to have a favourable occasion or opportunity.
to desire or beg for a place, shelter.
to tell, communicate the reason or motive.
to enter into or in between; to interrupt.
the centre or the central area, of a city.
to move, go on a path or road.
the space or period of time in between; an interval.
to go or come near; to approach.
the force or sway of the vortex or eddy of water.
(dial.) a congested place; a relatively narrower, smaller room than required.
to lose (a battle).
to fail to continue one's effort.
the middle of the day; noon.
(dial.) to weed out in the field by running a small agricultural implement (between two rows of crop).
the period in one's life between youth and old age (usu. from about forty to about sixty five years of age).
= ಎಡೆವಾಯ್.
to serve food; to offer food before a person.
= ಎಡೆವೊಗು.
=ಎಡೆಹರಗು.
the middle of the day; noon.
the quality of a thing that delights the senses or mental faculties, esp. the sight; beauty.
the quality of being good; goodness.
ಎಡ್ಡಮಾಗು eḍḍamāgu to be delightful; ಎಡ್ಡವಾಗು eḍḍavāgu = ಎಡ್ಡಮಾಗು.
an unintelligent, slow-witted, foolish man; a stupid man.
a person who habitually cheats; a swindler; a heat.
to become foolish; to lose one's wits.
lack of order, tidiness, etc.; awkward shape, manner; rude behaviour.
without any order; haphazardly; clumsily and recklessly; like a bull in the china shop.
to become beautiful or delightful.
an act, deed, that is done in a pleasing manner; a delightful work.
lack of intelligence; stupidity; foolishness.
the act or an instance of cheating; fraud; a dishonest artifice.
a beautiful place.
an unintelligent, slow-witted, foolish woman; a stupid woman.
a beautiful girl or woman.
the state of being beautiful, charming or delightful.
(dial.) the act, manner or behaviour of a stupid person.
= ಎಡ್ಡಂತಿಡ್ಡ.
to speak bitterly or reproachfully; to rail; to make fun of; to treat scornfully; to deride.
(dial.) something done or said intentionally to cheat another; fraud; trickery; cheating.
arrogant manner or behaviour; conceit; arrogance.
lack of intelligence; stupidity; foolishness.
(dial.) a game of chance played or money or some other stake; gambling.
(in composition) eight.
a knot of the hair on the scalp.
= ಎಣಗೋಣ.
contemptuous behaviour or manner; the act of despising; a moving of the neck to ridicule or mock another.
a pearl-like bead used for making necklace.
a necklace made of pearl-like beads strung together with a string or thread.
sexual intercourse; copulation.
count - the act of counting; the number reached by counting; a reckoning of the total.
the process of thinking, planning or guessing.
a disturbed state of mind; a worried state; anxiety or worry.
ಎಣಿಕೆ ಕಜ್ಜಾಯ eṇike kajjāya (fig.) (said about the availability of quantity of a thing) just enough; very restricted in numbers.
to attach little or no importance; to ignore; to disregard; to slight.
to be beyond one's capability of counting; to become innumerable.
= ಎಣಿಕೆಗೞಿ.
= ಎಣಿಕೆದಪ್ಪು - 1.
= ಎಣಿಕೆದಪ್ಪು - 2.
= ಎಣಿಕೆಗೊಳ್.
to conceive in the mind; to give mental attention to; to think over.
to form a rough estimate (without actual measurement or calculation.
to allow one's mind to dwell on difficulty or troubles; to worry.
(the process of counting, reckoning) to be broken; to go wrong.
(one's plan, scheme, guess, etc.) to go wrong; to fail.
a sudden, brief display of thought, understanding or plan flashing in the mind.
to take into account; to consider.
to be considered; to be taken into account.
to guess, consider deeply a plan, scheme etc. ; to think over.
to expect something to happen in one's favour or against one's rival.
a beautiful, charming woman.
the rains brought by the southwest wind from the Indian ocean (usu. from April to September); rains during the first half of the year.
the act of guessing.
the concept, plan or scheme in guessing.
to name numbers in regular order to a certain number; to reckon the total number; to add up, one by one, by units, so as to get a total; to count; to calculate.
to take into account; to consider.
to think; to plan or intend for a purpose.
to wish; to bid.

ಎಣಿಸಿಹಾಕಿದ ಕಜ್ಜಾಯ eṇisi hākida kajjāya = ಎಣಿಕೆ ಕಜ್ಜಾಯ; ಎಣಿಸಿದ್ದು ಒಂದಾದರೆ, ಆದದ್ದು ಮತ್ತೊಂದು eṇisiddu ondādare ādaddu mattondu (a saying) something that happened in a way different from or contrary to the one intended or expected.
the state or quality of being similar; resemblance or likeness; similarity.
love; deep affection.
a set of two; an intimate association of two persons; a pair.
one of the two, as related to the other, of the pair.

ಎಣೆಯಗಲು eṇeyagalu (the constitution of a pair) to be broken; to separate from the pair; ಎಣೆಯಾಗು eṇeyāgu to be equal to; to match in quality, character or value; to become similar; 2. to become one of the two in a pair.
a knot of hair on the scalp.
a particular disease affecting children.
a long and narrow hilltop, mountain range; ridge.
to make a pair by joining oneself with another.
to twist oneself with or around another.
to tie the hair into a knot on the head.
= ಎಣೆಗಂಟಿಕ್ಕು.
a knot of hair on the scalp.
to place oneself away from another; to cut off the physical, emotional relation; to lose one's connection, relation, equality, similarity etc.
to find an equal or matching person, relation.
to be associated with another (of equal status, quality or position to make a pair of); to couple.
= ಎಣೆಗೋಣ.
to equal another in a struggle, competition, etc.
to contract the disease eṇe (see ಎಣೆ3 above).
contemptuous behaviour or manner; the act of despising; a moving of the neck to ridicule or mock another.
a person or thing that is equal, similar to another in some way; a match; an analogous thing; the quality of being similar, equal, etc.
= ಎಣ್ಣೆವಾಳ (see under ಎಣ್ಣೆ).
a pair of mountains situated closely; a pair of two series of mountains extending almost parallel and close.
a man who is intimately associated with another; a close companion.
one who equals another in quality, capability, etc.
a letter that is similar in sound or is substitutable to another.
to play together (with a person who is equal in intelligence, physique, quality, rank, etc.).
(said of snakes) to entwine together, as in mating; to couple.
to oppose equally forcefully.
= ಎಣೆಯ.
a pair of or one of a pair, of ruddy goose (supposed to be together always).
(said of two persons, things) to be together; to make a pair.
to match for; to compete (with another) successfully.
the death of two persons happened simultaneously.
count - the act of counting; the number reached by counting; a reckoning of the total.
the process of thinking, planning or guessing.
amounting to eight khaṇḍugas (ಕೊಳಗ) [a measure of quantity (each of which is equal to twenty koḷagas (ಕೊಳಗ) of varying measures].
a quantity (of grains) amounting to eight khaṇḍugas (ಖಂಡುಗ) [a measure of quantity (each of which is equal to twenty koḷagas (ಕೊಳಗ) of varying measures].
(pl.) all the eight directions, as marked on a compass (as the east, southeast, south, southwest, etc.); the eight cardinal points.
a linear measure equal to eight times the distance from the tip of the middle finger of one hand to that of another hand of the same person.
a linear measure equal to eight Indian leagues.
a quantity (of grains) amounting to eight koḷagas(ಕೊಳಗ), of varying measures.
a measure of quantity.
an extent of agricultural land that requires eight koḷaga seeds, for being sown in.
amounting to eight thousand.
the cardinal number eight thousand; 8000.
(pl.) eight thousand people.
= ಎಣ್ಕೆ.
he who is engaged in manufacturing or selling of oil.
= ಎಣ್ಣು.
to name numbers in regular order to a certain number; to reckon the total number; to add up, one by one, by units, so as to get a total; to count; to calculate.
to take into account; to consider.
to plan or intend for a purpose.
a sweet dish made by frying in the oil.

any of various kinds of greasy, combustible substances obtained from animal, vegetable, and mineral sources, which are liquid at ordinary temperatures and soluble in certain organic solvents, as ether, but not in water; oil.
(fig.) potential force; capacity for vigorous action; energy.
(slang.) any alcoholic drink; liquor.

ಎಣ್ಣೆತೆಗೆ eṇṇe tege to extract oil (as from seed); ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಬೀರು eṇṇe bīru to distribute or pour oil for the oil lamp at the temple and at some houses (as a religious observance by Vīraśaiva community); ಎಣ್ಣೆಮಾಡು eṇṇe māḍu to put oil into the container of an oil-lamp; ಎಣ್ಣೆವಳ eṇṇevaḷa = ಎಣ್ಣೆವಾಳ; ಎಣ್ಣೆವಾಳ eṇṇevāḷa a bowl-shaped cooking vessel that is broad, shallow, with a handle, and made of metal used for frying food in oil etc.; a frying pan; ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಸುರಿ eṇṇe suri to put oil into the container of an oil-lamp; 2. (fig.) to make worse; to make more troublesome; ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಹಚ್ಚು eṇṇe haccu to smear with oil (as in massaging, oil-bath, etc.); ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಹಾಕು eṇṇe hāku (fig.) to make worse; to cause to increase another's fury; ಎಣ್ಣೆಸ್ನಾನ eṇṇe snāna a bath taken after massaging the body with oil; ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಬಂದಾಗ ಕಣ್ಣು ಮುಚ್ಚಿಕೊ eṇṇe bandāga kaṇṇu mucciko (prov.) to show indifference when the things are favourable; to disdain when fortune smiles; ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಅಳೆದ ಮಾನದ ಜಿಡ್ಡು ಹೋದೀತೆ? eṇṇe aḷeda mānada jiḍḍu hōdīte? (prov.) he who handles pitch shall foul his fingers; ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಅಳೆದ ಮಾನದಂತೆ eṇṇe aḷeda mānanadante (a simile) he who involves with others in a good effort, will earn unintentionally some benefits for himself too; ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಬತ್ತಿಗೆ ನೇರ eṇṇe battige nēra (prov.) (said about one's income) just sufficient to meet the essential expenses; 'hand to mouth'; ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಬರುವಾಗ ಗಾಣ ಮುರಿಯಿತು eṇṇe baruvāga gāṇa muriyitu (prov.) misfortune played havoc at the last moment; ಕಳ್ಳ ಹೊಕ್ಕಮನೆಗೆ ಎಣ್ಣೆ ದಂಡ kaḷḷa hokka manege eṇṇe daṇḍa (prov.) it is useless to spend money and time on futile corrective measures; ಉರಿಯುವ ಬೆಂಕಿಗೆ ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಸುರಿ uriyuva beŋkige eṇṇe suri (prov.) to cause to enrage further a person who is already furious; ಮೈಗೆ ಎಣ್ಣೆ ಹಚ್ಚಿಕೊಂಡಿರು maige eṇṇe haccikoṇḍiru (ironical saying) to be ready for strong reprimand or heavy beatings.
any seed that yields oil; oil-seed; a seed or crop grown mainly for oil; oil seed.
to tie the hair into a knot on the head.
= ಎಣ್ಣೆಗಂಟಿಕ್ಕು.
a knot of the hair on the scalp.
cloth made waterproof with heavy coats of paint, used for table and shelf coverings as a waterproof sheet; oilcloth.
the colour made by blending black and red colours; reddish black colour.
the bad smell of stale or spoiled oil; rancidity.
a vegetable preparation made by frying or boiling in oil.
to heat or boil oil.
darkish red (as of the complexion of skin) or reddish brown.
darkish red or reddish brown colour (as of the complexion of skin).
a container for oil.
a large oil container made of some metal.
the tree Elaeis guiancensis of Arecaceae family; oil palm.
a string or thread used to hold pearl-like beads together, as in a necklace.
the plant Corchorus trilocularis of Tiliaceae family.
= ಎಣ್ಣೆಗಪ್ಪಡ.
a curry made of brinjal fruit (Solanum melongena) fried in oil.
any seed that yields oil; oil-seed; a seed or crop grown mainly for oil; oil seed.
the plant Ehretia microphylla ( = E. buxifolia) of Ehretiaceae family.
a kind of medicinal plant.
a bath taken after massaging the body with oil.
= ಎಣ್ಣೆಗಮಟು.
a pearl-like bead used for making necklace.
the tree Kingiodendron pinnatum ( = Hardwickia pinnata) of Caesalpiniaceae family.
the plant Gynocardia odorata of Flacourtiaceae family.
(dial.) a gift of land to the temple of a town-deity, for meeting the expense of oil for the deity's lamp.
= ಎಣ್ಣೆಹೂರಿಗೆ.
a rice-preparation seasoned with oil, tamarind or lemon-juice, pepper, etc.
= ಎಣ್ಣೆಮಣಿ.
a necklace made of pearl-like beads strung together with a string or thread.
a religious rite of anointing a person's head with oil, before taking a bath (as observed in a marriage).
(fig.) natural, but deep enmity; (in pl.) those who fight like dogs and cats; two bitter enemies.
a kind of grass.
a small, usually ring-shaped cake of sweetened, leavened dough, fried in deep oil; dough-nut.
= ಎಣ್ಣೆಹೂರಿಗೆ.
= ಎಣ್ದೆಸೆ.
(pl.) all the eight directions, as marked on a compass (as the east, southeast, south, southwest, etc.); the eight cardinal points.
(pl.) the eight regents of eight directions.
(pl.) (myth.) the eight divine elephants that are believed to guard eight cardinal points.
= ಎಣ್ಬತ್ತು1.
= ಎಣ್ಬತ್ತು2.
(pl.) the eight forms of Śiva.
(pl.) eight days.
eight times ten; eighty.
the cardinal number eighty; 80.
(pl.) eight persons.
= (correctly) ಎಣ್ಬತ್ತು1.
= (correctly) ಎಣ್ಬತ್ತು2.
eight times (the quantity, number etc.).
(increasing, decreasing, etc.) to the extent of eight times.
eight times the quantity or number.
= ಎಣ್ಮೆಯ್ಯ.
= ಎಣ್ಮಡಿ1.
= ಎಣ್ಮಡಿ2.
= ಎಣ್ಮಡಿ3.
Śiva, who has eight different forms.
= ಎಣ್ಬರ್.
(correctly, ಯತಿ)an ascetic who has subdued his passions and renounced worldly attachments.
(correctly, ಯತಿತನ) the quality, life or state of an ascetic who has subdued his passions and renounced worldly attachments.
to what place; towards which direction

ಎತ್ತಹೋದರೂ ಮೃತ್ಯು ಬಿಡದು etta hōdarū mřtyu biḍadu (prov.) there is no escape from death; death meets us wherever we are; ಎತ್ತ ಬಿದ್ದರೂ ಮೂಗುಮೇಲೆ etta biddarū mūgu mēle (prov.) he does not accept his defeat even when he is humbled; though vanquished, he could argue still.
whosesoever; everywhere.
the condition of a business, commercial venture, becoming insolvent; bankruptcy.
a transferring or being transferred; an instance of it.
the tree Anthocephalus cadamba of Rubiaceae family.
= ಎತ್ತಕ.
the food items prepared and kept aside (in the kitchen).
of or belonging to which place or direction.
from where; from which direction or place.
(used as an interrogative or as a relative pronoun) a thing that is of or belonging to which place or direction.
height - a) the distance from bottom to the top of something standing upright; b) the extent of elevation above a level.
the state of being higher in development, growth or level of attainment which is worthy of respect.
the state of being highly disordered; want of order or discipline; awkward condition.
= ಎತ್ತಲು.
everywhere; at all places.

to raise; - a) to lift; to raise to a higher place; to elevate; b) to increase the height; to heighten; c) to raise the pitch or volume of; d) to raise the mood, level of understanding, spirits of; to elate; to improve.
= ಎತ್ತರತತ್ತರ.
wheresoever.
in whatsoever way.
a short extract from a book, film, piece of music, etc.; for the purpose of reference, example etc.; excerption.
the act of lifting up.
he who lifts, elevates or raises.
he who sets free or saves from evil or danger; a deliverer.
to cause to erect, lift or elevate or to have erected, lifted or elevated.
to repair what is worn out or dilapidated; to renovate; to restore; to rejuvenate.
to convey (another) to the heaven.
to cause to attack; to help or incite another in making an inroad.
to cause to get or help getting collected (subscription, help etc.).
ಎತ್ತಿಸಿಕೊಡು ettisikoḍu to cause to erect; to cause to build up; 2. to cause to get (money, subscription, help, etc.) collected.
to raise to a higher position; to lift; to elevate.
to hoist (a flag).
to cause (water) to flow into a farm, field etc.
to take away or snatch (something) from another using force or threat.
to march against a country or king with an intention to wage a war and conquer.
to gather; to collect (money, subscription, help etc).
to serve food (to a person).
to cause to wake up from sleep; to wake up.
to construct; to build up.
to wave lighted lamps (before a deity).
to offer oblations.
to select; to choose.
to set free or save from evil or danger.
to speak or write something what is said or written by him earlier; to repeat a passage from another's or one's earlier book; to cite an example; to quote.
to begin; to commence.
to find how many times (one quantity) contains another; to divide.
to pick up (as, to chose one thing among many, as in lottery).
to take a liquid, esp. liquor, into the mouth and swallow it; to drink.
to cause to drink.

ಎತ್ತಿ ಆಡಿಸು etti āḍisu to handle tenderly, lovingly (a child); ಎತ್ತಿ ಆಡು etti āḍu to express one's comments charging another with commission of impropriety, etc. ; to talk about another's past deed as to injure him; ಎತ್ತಿ ಎಣಿಸು etti eṇisu = ಎತ್ತಿ ಆಡು; ಎತ್ತಿ ಎಸೆ etti ese to throw away or out (using force, often in anger or contempt); ಎತ್ತಿಕಟ್ಟು etti kaṭṭu to build up; to construct above a level; 2. (fig.) to incite or provoke hatred in a person against another; to instigate; ಎತ್ತಿಕಳೆ etti kaḷe to remove (completely from); to ward off; ಎತ್ತಿಕೊಂಡು ಹೋಗು ettikoṇḍu hōgu to carry away; to take away; to abduct; to steal; ಎತ್ತಿಕೊಡು etti koḍu (in singing) to assist one to commence or recover the forgotten portion (from behind); 2. to provoke the ill-feeling of a person against another; ಎತ್ತಿಕೊಳ್ ettikoḷ to take up (a child, person) in to one's arms; 2. to take, quote or adapt a statement, passage etc. from another's statement, writing or book; 3. to take up a matter for consideration or discussion; ಎತ್ತಿಡು ettiḍu to keep aside (an amount, a portion of profit, income, budgeted amount etc.) for a specific purpose; ಎತ್ತಿತರ್ ettitar to collect (tax, subscription, help etc.); ಎತ್ತಿತೋರಿಸು ettitōrisu to make (something) obvious or conspicuous; ಎತ್ತಿತೋರು ettitōru = ಎತ್ತಿತೋರಿಸು; 2) to quote from someone's speech, statement or writing; ಎತ್ತಿದ ಕೈ ettida kai a person who handled (one) tenderly, lovingly; 2. (fig.) an adept person (in something); 3. (fig.) the quality of being adept in a trade etc.; adeptness; ಎತ್ತಿನಡೆ ettinaḍe to march against a king, state (to conquer); to attack; to make an inroad; ಎತ್ತಿಪೋಗು ettipōgu = ಎತ್ತಿನಡೆ; ಎತ್ತಿಬಡಿ ettibaḍi to bang (a vessel or any thing) on the floor; 2. to take or snatch away (something) from another using force or threat; ಎತ್ತಿಬರ್ ettibar to come (with an army) to conquer; to attack; to make an inroad; ಎತ್ತಿ ಬರೆ ettibare to write reproducing or repeating a passage from a statement or from a book; to quote; ಎತ್ತಿಮಾಱು ettimāṛu to sell something to a highest bidder; ಎತ್ತಿಹಾಕು ettihāku to throw away; 2. to get or hold back (another's) money or property by fraud; to cheat; to defraud; 3. to go beyond or exceed showing deliberate disregard (to another); 4. to transfer (an official) to a different place of working; ಎತ್ತಿಹಿಡಿ ettihiḍi to hold up; to raise; to keep in an elevated place or position; 2. to keep from falling; to support; 3. to decide in favour of; to agree with or support (another's opinion, statement etc.); to uphold; ಎತ್ತಿ ಹೇಳು etti hēḷu to mention; to quote (from a book, article, etc.); ಎತ್ತಿಹೋಗು ettihōgu to march against a king, state (to conquer); to attack; to make an inroad; 2. to move from one's living place to another; to migrate; 3. to be ruined; to perish; ಎತ್ತುತ್ತಿದ್ದ ಹಾಗೆಯೇ ettuttidda hāgeyē in the very beginning; at the commencement itself; ಎತ್ತಿಕೊಂಡು ಹೋಗುವವರಿದ್ದರೆ ಸತ್ತಹಾಗೆ ಬಿದ್ದೇನು ettikoṇḍu hōguvavariddare sattahāge biddēnu (prov.) show sympathy on me, I take full advantage; If you have a horse, I prefer riding to walking.
a castrated domesticated bull (Bos taurus); an ox; a bullock.
an adult bull not castrated, either domesticated or not.
ಎತ್ತಿನ ನಾಲಿಗೆ ettina nālige the plant Elephantopus scaber of Asteraceae family.
the tree Mallotus phillippensis ( = Rottlera tinctoria) of Euphorbiaceae family.

ಮೂಕ ಎತ್ತಿನ ಹಾಗೆ ದುಡಿ mūka ettina hāge duḍi to work very hard continuously without grumbling, (often without proper reward or recognition); to work like a beaver; ಎತ್ತು ಈಯಿತು ಎಂದರೆ ಕೊಟ್ಟಿಗೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಕಟ್ಟು ಎಂದಹಾಗೆ ettu īyitu endare koṭṭigeyalli kaṭṭu enda hāge (proverbial analogy) to act stupidly; to do exactly what one is told, without thinking whether it is right, practical or not; to be bull-headed; ಎತ್ತು ಏರಿಗೆ ಎಳೆದರೆ ಕೋಣ ನೀರಿಗೆ ಎಳೆಯಿತು ettu ērige eḷedare, kōṇa nīrige eḷeyitu (prov.) (proverbial analogy) to work incoherently; all men row galley way; ಎತ್ತಿಗೆ ಜ್ವರ ಬಂದರೆ ಎಮ್ಮೆಗೆ ಬರೆ ಹಾಕು ettige jvara bandare emmege bare hāku (prov.) punish Peter for Felix's fault; ಎತ್ತಿನ ಮುಂದೆ ತೆಂಗಿನಕಾಯಿ ಒಡೆದ ಹಾಗೆ ettina munde teŋginakāyi oḍedahāge (proverbial analogy) what should a cow do with a nutmeg; ಎತ್ತು ಒಳ್ಳೆಯದಾದರೆ ಇದ್ದ ಊರಲ್ಲೇ ಗಿರಾಕಿ ettu oḷḷeyadādare idda ūrallē girāki (prov.) merit brings the deserved reward; good ware makes a good market; ಎತ್ತು ಉಚ್ಚೆಹುಯ್ದ ಹಾಗೆ ettu ucce huydahāge (a proverbial simile) (slang) to do or continue to do, something without a break.

the chest - a) that part of the mammalian body between the neck and the abdomen in whose cavity the heart and lungs lie; b) the middle of the three chief divisions of the body of an insect or the corresponding part of a crustacean or an arachnid; c) the fore or ventral part of the body between the neck and the abdomen in humans.
the pair of mammary glands extending from the chest in adult human females; the female breasts.
the heart, the organ that maintains blood circulation in the body.
one's feelings or sentiments.
courage; bravery; manly spirit; self-confidence.

ಎದೆ ಡವಡವಗುಟ್ಟು/ಡವಡವ ಎನ್ನುತ್ತಿರು ede ḍavaḍavaguṭṭu/ḍavaḍava ennuttiru (fig.) (one's heart) to beat strongly or fast as from emotion, fear, anxiety, etc.; to be nervous or anxious about something; ಎದೆ ಧಸಕ್ಕೆನ್ನು ede dhasakkennu (fig.) (one's courage, self-confidence, bearing capacity) to be lost from fear, unexpected loss, loss of support etc.; ಎದೆ ಬರು ede baru (fig.) (chiefly in negative sense) (courage, resoluteness, etc.) to be got; ಎದೆ ಬಿಚ್ಚಿ ಮಾತನಾಡು ede bicci mātanāḍu (fig.) to tell what all one has in mind or feels like telling; to talk open-heartedly; ಎದೆಯನ್ನು ಕಲ್ಲು ಮಾಡಿಕೊ edeyannu kallu māḍiko (fig.) to become hard-hearted; to become unyielding; to brace (oneself) to face danger, suffering, etc; to nerve oneself; ಎದೆಯನ್ನು ಗಟ್ಟಿ ಮಾಡಿಕೊ edeyannu gaṭṭi māḍiko = ಎದೆಯನ್ನು ಕಲ್ಲು ಮಾಡಿಕೊ; ಎದೆಯನ್ನು ಚುಚ್ಚು edeyannu cuccu (fig.) to prick one's conscience; to cause one feel guilty; ಎದೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಕುಳಿತಿರು edeya mēle kuḷitiru (fig.) to cause a compelling influence; to constrain; to force (to do); ಎದೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಕೈಯಿಟ್ಟುಕೊಂಡು ಹೇಳು edeya me1le kaiyiṭṭukoṇḍu hēḷu (fig.) to tell (something) truthfully and confidently; ಎದೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಅವಲಕ್ಕಿ ಕುಟ್ಟಿದಂತಾಗು edeyalli avalakki kuṭṭidantāgu (fig.) (the heart) to throb fast and strongly as from fright; ಭಾರವಾದ ಎದೆ bhāravāda ede a heart fraught with grief or disappointment; ಎದೆ ಸೀಳಿದರೂ ಎರಡಕ್ಷರ ಇರದಿರು ede sīḷidarū erḍakṣara iradiru (prov.) to be an absolute illiterate; ಎದೆಕಂದು edekandu to lose courage; to become diffident or frightened; ಎದೆಕೊಡು ede koḍu (fig.) to feed (a baby) milk from the breast; to suckle; to nurse; to breast-feed; 2. to take up the responsibility boldly; ಎದೆಹಣ್ಣಾಗು ede haṇnāgu to lose courage completely.
a belt or a support for the chest (used as a physiological aid).
(one's feelings, attitude) to become gentle and tender; to become sympathetic.
a piece of armour for the breast; a chest-guard.
stubborn courage; courage to meet danger or difficulty; the strength to bear misfortune with a right attitude.
to face bravely; to confront boldly.
to embolden; to give courage or confidence to.
to feed (a baby) milk from the breast; to breast-feed.
an unfeeling, pitiless, cruel man; a barbarian; a brute.
the quality of a being ruthless; cruelty; brutality; savageness.
= ಎದೆಗಾರಿಕೆ.
= ಎದೆಗತ್ತಿ -2.
a sword, dagger, etc. to cut or break one's opponent's chest (in a combat).
(fig.) that which inflicts unbearable pain and suffering; that which breaks one's heart.
the barrier or veil that keeps one's feeling, sentiment from others.
(one's feelings, sentiments, mental piece, etc.) to be disturbed.
one's disturbed feelings, sentiments, piece, etc.; such a state.
